subject: Implement ecosystem intelligence brief (Phase 5)
description:
Create generate_ecosystem_brief.py with comprehensive multi-project dashboard showing: system health (21 projects), top cross-project innovations, package updates, synergies, 7-day roadmap, meta-vengine evolution changelog, ecosystem metrics. Modify session-optimizer-start.sh to inject brief on session start.

Success criteria:
- Brief displays all sections
- Cross-project synergies highlighted
- Dependency-ordered roadmap shown
- Meta-vengine evolution included
- Links functional

Files to create:
- ~/researchgravity/orchestrator/generate_ecosystem_brief.py (~400 lines)
